Texts.Chs: 给你个任务：使用^orange;装备合成器^reset;制作一个^orange;飞螳头盔^reset;。我会给你相应奖励，我真的非常需要它。
Texts.Eng: A task for you: Use a ^orange;Clothing Fabricator^reset; and produce a ^orange;Mutavisk Helm^reset;. I'll pay well for it, as I am in dire need.

Texts.Chs: 把^orange;飞螳头盔^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给我。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Mutavisk Helm^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 谢谢你，我终于可以穿着整套^orange;飞螳装备^reset;在辐射世界中探索了。
Texts.Eng: Thanks to you, I can finally take a trip to an ^orange;Irradiated^reset; world with my complete ^orange;Mutavisk Armor Set^reset;!
